get.summary: Return list of app charts.
Return details of the named `Chart`.

get.description: Return the chart names. (No prefix == Empty prefix == All match)

get.summary: Return the chart names with prefix `Pattern`.
Return list of applications in all namespaces.
Return list of configurations in all namespaces.

get.description: Return list of names for all controlled namespaces (No prefix = empty prefix = match everything)

get.summary: Return list of names for all controlled namespaces whose name matches the prefix `Pattern`.
Return list of all controlled namespaces.
Return details of the named `Namespace`.
Return list of applications in the `Namespace`.

post.summary: Create the posted new application in the `Namespace`.

get.summary: Return details of the named `App` in the `Namespace`.

post.summary: Create configuration binding between `App` in `Namespace`, and the posted configurations, also in `Namespace`.

delete.summary: Remove configuration binding between `App` and `Configuration` in `Namespace`.

post.summary: Create the deployment, configuration and ingress resources for the named `App` in the `Namespace`.

get.summary: Return the environment variable assignments for the `App` in the namespace`.

post.summary: Create/modify the posted environment variable assignments for the `App` in the `Namespace`.

get.summary: Return the named `Env` variable assignment for the `App` in the `Namespace`.

delete.summary: Remove the named `Env` variable from the `App` in the `Namespace`.

get.description: Return the environment variable names of the `App` in the `Namespace`. (No prefix == Empty prefix == All match)

get.summary: Return the environment variable names of the `App` in the `Namespace` with prefix `Pattern`.
Get a shell to the `App` in the `Namespace`.

post.summary: Store the named `App` from a Git repo in the `Namespace`.

get.summary: Return logs of the named `App` in the `Namespace` streamed over a websocket.
Return parts of the named `App` in the `Namespace`.
Get a shell to the `App` in the `Namespace`.
Wait for the named `App` in the `Namespace` to be running.

post.summary: Create the resources needed to stage the named `App` in the `Namespace`.

get.summary: Return map from configurations in the `Namespace`, to the apps in the same.
Return list of configurations in the `Namespace`.

post.summary: Create the posted new configuration in the `Namespace`.

get.summary: Return details of the named `Configuration` in the `Namespace`.

put.description: Replace the named `Configuration` in the `Namespace` as per the instructions in the body

patch.description: Update the named `Configuration` in the `Namespace` as per the instructions in the body

get.summary: Return list of services in the `Namespace`.

post.summary: Create a named service of an Epinio catalog service in the `Namespace`.

get.summary: Return details of the named `Service` in the `Namespace`.

post.summary: Bind the named `Service` in the `Namespace` to an App.
Unbind the named `Service` in the `Namespace` from an App.

get.summary: Waits for the completion of the staging process identified by `StageID` in the `Namespace`.
Return logs of the named `StageID` in the `Namespace` streamed over a websocket.
Return all available Epinio Catalog services.
Return details of the named Epinio `CatalogService`.

App.description:
The main structure has identifying information.
It is used in the CLI and API responses.
If an error is hit while constructing the app object, the Error attribute
will be set to that.
App.title: App has all the application's properties, for at rest (Configuration), and active (Workload).

AppChart.description:
AppChart matches github.com/epinio/application/api/v1 AppChartSpec
Reason for existence: Do not expose the internal CRD struct in the API.

AppChartList.description: AppChartList is a collection of app charts

AppDeployment.description:
AppDeployment contains all the information specific to an active
application, i.e. one with a deployment in the cluster.

AppList.description: AppList is a collection of app references

AppRef.description: AppRef references an App by name and namespace

ApplicationCreateRequest.description:
ApplicationCreateRequest represents and contains the data needed to
create an application (at rest), possibly with presets (configurations)

ApplicationDeleteResponse.description: ApplicationDeleteResponse represents the server's response to a successful app deletion

ApplicationOrigin.description:
ApplicationOrigin is the part of the manifest describing the origin of the application
(sources). At most one of the fields may be specified / not empty.

Kind.description:
Hidden from yaml. Type tag to simplify struct usage.
Note: we cannot hide this property from the JSON since it's used to unmarshal correctly the result of the Apps endpoint
@see failling test here: https://github.com/epinio/epinio/runs/4935898437?check_suite_focus=true
We should probably expose a more meaningful value instead of this "Kind" int

ApplicationUpdateRequest.description:
ApplicationUpdateRequest represents and contains the data needed to update
an application. Specifically to modify the number of replicas to
run, and the configurations bound to it.
Note: Instances is a pointer to give us a nil value separate from
actual integers, as means of communicating `default`/`no change`.

BindRequest.title: BindRequest represents and contains the data needed to bind configurations to an application.

BindResponse.description:
BindResponse represents the server's response to the successful binding of configurations to
an application.

ChartCreateRequest.description:
ChartCreateRequest represents and contains the data needed to create an application
chart instance

ChartMatchResponse.description: ChartMatchResponse contains the list of names for matching application charts

ConfigurationCreateRequest.description:
ConfigurationCreateRequest represents and contains the data needed to
create a configuration instance

ConfigurationDeleteResponse.description: ConfigurationDeleteResponse represents the server's response to a successful configuration deletion

ConfigurationRef.description: ConfigurationRef references a Configuration by name and namespace

ConfigurationReplaceRequest.description:
ConfigurationReplaceRequest represents and contains the data needed to
replace a configuration instance

ConfigurationResponse.description: ConfigurationResponse represents the data of a single configuration instance

ConfigurationResponseList.description: ConfigurationResponseList represents a collection of configuration instance

ConfigurationShowResponse.description: ConfigurationShowResponse contains details about a configuration

ConfigurationUpdateRequest.description:
ConfigurationUpdateRequest represents and contains the data needed to
update a configuration instance (add/change, and remove keys)

DeployRequest.description:
DeployRequest represents and contains the data needed to deploy an application
Note that the overall application configuration (instances, configurations, EVs) is
already known server side, through AppCreate/AppUpdate requests.
This request not only comes with the image to deploy, but also the
information where the sources of that image came from.

DeployResponse.description: DeployResponse represents the server's response to a successful app deployment

EnvMatchResponse.description: EnvMatchResponse contains the list of names for matching envs

EnvVariable.description: EnvVariable represents the Show Response for a single environment variable

EnvVariableMap.description:
EnvVariableMap is a collection of EVs as a map. It is used for Set Requests, and as
List Responses

HelmRepo.description:
HelmRepo matches github.com/epinio/application/api/v1 HelmRepo
Reason for existence: Do not expose the internal CRD struct in the API.

InfoResponse.description: InfoResponse contains information about Epinio and its components

Namespace.description:
Namespace has all the namespace properties, i.e. name, app names, and configuration names
It is used in the CLI and API responses.

NamespaceCreateRequest.description: NamespaceCreateRequest contains the name of the namespace that should be created

NamespaceList.description: NamespaceList is a collection of namespaces

NamespacesMatchResponse.description: NamespacesMatchResponse contains the list of names for matching namespaces

ServiceCreateRequest.description:
Service matches github.com/epinio/application/api/v1 ServiceSpec
Reason for existence: Do not expose the internal CRD struct in the API.

StageRef.description:
StageRef references a staging run by ID, currently randomly generated
for each POST to the staging endpoint

StageRequest.description: StageRequest represents and contains the data needed to stage an application

StageResponse.description: StageResponse represents the server's response to a successful app staging

UploadResponse.description: UploadResponse represents the server's response to a successful app sources upload
